body:
Mysql supports it:
https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/master/common/persistence/sql/sqlplugin/mysql/plugin.go#L107
Postgres does not:
https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/master/common/persistence/sql/sqlplugin/postgres/plugin.go#L80
title: Postgres plugin should support maxConns config
